00013  * Clase engarda de validar que los datos de conexión facilitados son correctos
00014  * además de definir si el plugin requiere de validación remota o local (oauth)
00015  */
00016 class Plugins_Twitter_Auth extends Common_Auth
00017 {
00018     private $_data;
00019     private $_config;
00020 
00021     /**
00022      * @return void
00023      */
00024     function __construct()
00025     {
00026         // Call the Model constructor
00027         parent::__construct();
00028 
00029         $config = array(
00030             'version' => '1.0',
00031             'requestScheme' => Zend_Oauth::REQUEST_SCHEME_HEADER,
00032             'signatureMethod' => 'HMAC-SHA1',
00033             'callbackUrl' => site_url('accounts/auth'),
00034         );
00035 
00036         $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00037         $config = array_merge($config, $this->_ci->config->item('twitter', 'apikeys'));
00038 
00039         $this->_config = $config;
00040     }
00041 
00042     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00043      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#hasRemoteAuth()
00044      */
00045     public function hasRemoteAuth()
00046     {
00047         return true;
00048     }
00049 
00050     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00051      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#remoteAuth()
00052      */
00053     public function remoteAuth()
00054     {
00055         $consumer = new Zend_Oauth_Consumer($this->_config);
00056 
00057         //fetch a request token
00058         $token = $consumer->getRequestToken();
00059 
00060         //persist the token to storage
00061         if (session_id() == "") {
00062             session_start();
00063         }
00064 
00065         $_SESSION['TWITTER_REQUEST_TOKEN'] = serialize($token);
00066 
00067         //redirect the user
00068         $consumer->redirect();
00069     }
00070 
00071     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00072      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#setData($data)
00073      */
00074     public function setData($data)
00075     {
00076          $this->_data = $data;
00077     }
00078 
00079     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00080      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#getData()
00081      */
00082     public function getData()
00083     {
00084         return $this->_data;
00085     }
00086 
00087     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00088      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#validate()
00089      */
00090     public function validate()
00091     {
00092         if (isset($this->_data["denied"])) {
00093 
00094             return "Acceso denegado";
00095         }
00096 
00097         if (session_id() == "") {
00098             session_start();
00099         }
00100 
00101         $consumer = new Zend_Oauth_Consumer($this->_config);
00102 
00103         $token = $consumer->getAccessToken($this->_data, unserialize($_SESSION['TWITTER_REQUEST_TOKEN']));
00104         unset($_SESSION['TWITTER_REQUEST_TOKEN']);
00105 
00106         $this->_data = serialize($token);
00107 
00108         return true;
00109     }
00110 }
